text: Aur woh waqt yaad kerna chahaiye kay aap kay rab ney yeh baat batla di kay woh inn yahud per qayamat tak aisay shaks ko zaroor musallat kerta rahey ga jo inn ko sazay-e-shadeed ki takleef phonchata rahey ga bila shuba aap ka rab jaldi hi saza dey deta hai aur bila shuba woh waqaee bari maghfirat aur bari rehmat wala hai
